thread.section_title: Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location!
thread.title_full: Perfect location! - Review of Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ASM13
title: Perfect location!
text: Traveling with 12 people to Europe last summer. Novotel was stylish, chic, yet great for the kids and infant! Breakfast buffet is AMAZING and included with stay. Right on the River Seine and a good walk to the Eiffel Tower. Many cafes, restaurants and shops on the way. Very convenient to the trains. The rooms were a little small, but we weren't in there but to shower and sleep! Would love to stay again!!
